verbs.description: [ARG0: White House Counselor Kellyanne Conway] [V: took] [ARG1: CNN ’s Dana Bash] [ARGM-GOL: to task] [ARGM-CAU: for questioning her husband ’s tweets , which were critical of President Donald Trump , on CNN ’s “ State of the Union with Jake Tapper] . ”
